item.title: JavaScript Function Invocation #11
item.description: JavaScript variables can belong to the local or global scope.Global variables can be made local (private) with closures.
item.dc:creator: Iris Chew

item.title: JavaScript Function Closures #10
item.description: The code inside a function is not executed when the function is defined.The code inside a function is executed when the function is invoked. It is common to use the term "call a function" instead of "invoke a function".
item.dc:creator: Iris Chew

item.title: JavaScript Function Parameters #9
item.description: A JavaScript function does not perform any checking on parameter values (arguments).
item.dc:creator: Iris Chew

item.title: JavaScript Function Definitions #8
item.description: A JavaScript function is a block of code designed to perform a particular task.
item.dc:creator: Iris Chew

item.title: JavaScript Data Types #7
item.description: JavaScript variables can hold many data types.
item.dc:creator: Iris Chew

item.title: JavaScript Syntax - Operators #6
item.description: JavaScript uses arithmetic operators` ( + - * / )` to compute values
item.dc:creator: Iris Chew

item.title: JavaScript Syntax - Value #5
item.description: Fixed values are called literals. Variable values are called variables.
item.dc:creator: Iris Chew

item.title: JavaScript Where To #2
item.description: Where can place scipts at the html? Head? Body? External? or External References?
item.dc:creator: Iris Chew

item.title: Why JavaScript #1
item.description: This is the weekly writing challenge, i hope i can do it. Now is the perfect time to make a fresh start.
item.dc:creator: Iris Chew
